[00:00.00]The Middle - Zedd/Maren Morris/Grey
[00:01.22]Written by：Anton Zaslavski/Kyle Trewartha/Michael Trewartha/Sarah Aarons/Stefan Johnson/Marcus Lomax/Jordan K. Johnson
[00:02.44]Take a seat
[00:03.38]
[00:04.65]Right over there
[00:05.87]Sat on the stairs
[00:06.89]Stay or leave
[00:07.76]
[00:08.99]The cabinets are bare
[00:10.09]And I'm unaware
[00:11.16]Of just how we got
[00:13.15]Into this mess
[00:14.29]Got so aggressive
[00:15.72]I know we meant
[00:17.62]All good intentions
[00:19.41]So pull me closer
[00:20.96]
[00:21.48]Why don't you pull me close
[00:23.09]
[00:23.63]Why don't you come on over
[00:25.80]I can't just let you go
[00:27.72]
[00:29.22]Baby
[00:29.69]
[00:31.56]Why don't you just meet me in the middle
[00:34.26]
[00:35.73]I'm losing my mind just a little
